original_text: You know that our Lord Jesus Christ is very kind. He was rich, but he made himself poor to help you. So then, because he became poor, you could become rich.
korean_text: 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 은혜를 너희가 알거니와 부요하신 이로서 너희를 위하여 가난하게 되심은 그의 가난함으로 말미암아 너희를 부요하게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: You know that our Lord Jesus Christ is very kind
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 우리 주 예수 그리스도가 매우 친절하다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: So then, because he became poor
